metadata.title: CVE-2020-25739 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the gon gem before gon-6.4.0 for Ruby. MultiJsondoes not honor the escape_mode parameter to escape fields as an XSSprotection mechanism. To mitigate, json_dumper.rb in gon now does escapingfor XSS by default without relying on MultiJson.

criterions.comment: ruby-gon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
